pageContext.claim: “I mean, nobody has done the job that we've done on the border.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump generally is referring to securing the border. U.S. Customs and Border Protection officials reported 1.6 million southwest border apprehensions for fiscal 2000. In fiscal 2017, CBP reported nearly 304,000. That’s an 81.5 percent decline overall. Plus, the administration has failed to pass any kind of comprehensive change to immigration policy.
